h2.div: Updates on COVID-19 and our school closures

div.p: This information will be updated frequently. (updated on 3/30/20)

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: April 13, 2020: Distance Learning begins. Distance Learning will continue until schools reopen or June 5, 2020.
30 de marzo, 2020 a 10 de abril, 2020: Vacaciones de primavera
13 de abril, 2020: Aprendizaje a distancia empieza. Aprendizaje a distancia continuara hasta que se abren las escuelas o hasta el 5 de junio, 2020.

SMJUSD is distributing free lunch and breakfast daily. Our food service will continue through spring break (March 30-April 10) and as long as schools remain closed. Children must be present to receive their food per federal guidelines.

SMJUSD está distribuyendo alimentos diario. Nuestro servicio de comidas continuará durante vacaciones de primavera (30 de marzo a 10 de abril) hasta terminemos con el cierre de las escuelas. Los niños tienen que estar presentes para recibir su comida por pautas federales.

div.small: The Mission of our school is to provide a safe and enriching learning environment where the whole student is nurtured and developed. Our teachers and administrators pledge to support the academic and emotional well being of each and every student. Students will leave our school prepared with skills and knowledge that will give them advantages throughout their future educational and life experiences. Our rigorous standards challenge all students to rise to their full potential and become the best global citizens they can be.

div.p: San Miguel Joint Union School District
div.small: The Board of Trustees is committed to providing equal opportunity for all individuals in education. District programs, activities, and practices shall be free from discrimination based on gender, race, color, actual or perceived ancestry, national origin, ethnic group identification, age, religion, marital or parental status, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or genetic information, the perception of one or more of such characteristics, or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. San Miguel Joint Union is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

San Miguel Joint Union complies with the requirements of the U.S. Office of Civil Rights laws, such as the Fair Employment Practices Act, Title IX Regulations, Section 504, Title II and ADA requirements in employment and education programs and activities.
